error._primary: Would you like to send all the participants a cancelation notice?
error._secondary: If you do not send a cancelation notice, the other participants may not know the meeting is canceled.

error._primary: Are you sure you want to delete this meeting?
error._secondary: All information on this meeting will be deleted and can not be restored.

error._primary: Would you like to send all the participants a cancelation notice?
error._secondary: If you do not send a cancelation notice, the other participants may not know the task has been deleted.

error._primary: Are you sure you want to delete this task?
error._secondary: All information on this task will be deleted and can not be restored.

error._primary: Would you like to send a cancelation notice for this journal entry?
error._secondary: If you do not send a cancelation notice, the other participants may not know the journal has been deleted.

error._primary: Are you sure you want to delete this journal entry?
error._secondary: All information on this journal entry will be deleted and can not be restored.

error._primary: Are you sure you want to delete the appointment titled '{0}'?
error._secondary: All information on this appointment will be deleted and can not be restored.

error._primary: Are you sure you want to delete this appointment?
error._secondary: All information on this appointment will be deleted and can not be restored.

error._primary: Are you sure you want to delete the '{0}' task?
error._secondary: All information on this task will be deleted and can not be restored.

error._primary: Are you sure you want to delete this task?
error._secondary: All information on this task will be deleted and can not be restored.

error._primary: Are you sure you want to delete the journal entry '{0}'?
error._secondary: All information in this journal will be deleted and can not be restored.

error._primary: Are you sure you want to delete this journal entry?
error._secondary: All information in this journal will be deleted and can not be restored.

error._primary: Are you sure you want to delete these {0} appointments?
error._secondary: All information on these appointments will be deleted and can not be restored.

error._primary: Are you sure you want to delete these {0} tasks?
error._secondary: All information on these tasks will be deleted and can not be restored.

error._primary: Are you sure you want to delete these {0} journal entries?
error._secondary: All information in these journal entries will be deleted and can not be restored.

error.title: Save Appointment
error._primary: Would you like to save your changes to this appointment?
error._secondary: You have changed this appointment, but not yet saved them.

error.title: Save Task
error._primary: Would you like to save your changes to this task?
error._secondary: You have made changes to this task, but not yet saved them.

error._primary: Would you like to send meeting invitations to participants?
error._secondary: Email invitations will be sent to all participants and allow them to reply.

error._primary: Would you like to send updated meeting information to participants?
error._secondary: Sending updated information allows other participants to keep their calendars up to date.

error._primary: Would you like to send this task to participants?
error._secondary: Email invitations will be sent to all participants and allow them to accept this task.

error._primary: Download in progress. Do you want to save the task?
error._secondary: Some attachments are being downloaded. Saving the task would result in the loss of these attachments.

error._primary: Download in progress. Do you want to save the appointment?
error._secondary: Some attachments are being downloaded. Saving the appointment would result in the loss of these attachments.

error._primary: Would you like to send updated task information to participants?
error._secondary: Sending updated information allows other participants to keep their task lists up to date.

error._primary: The Evolution tasks have quit unexpectedly.
error._secondary: Your tasks will not be available until Evolution is restarted.

error._primary: The Evolution calendar has quit unexpectedly.
error._secondary: Your calendars will not be available until Evolution is restarted.

error._primary: Editor could not be loaded.
Delete calendar '{0}'?
error._secondary: This calendar will be removed permanently.

error._primary: Delete task list '{0}'?
error._secondary: This task list will be removed permanently.

error._primary: Delete memo list '{0}'?
error._secondary: This memo list will be removed permanently.

error._primary: Are you sure you want to send the appointment without a summary?
error._secondary: Adding a meaningful summary to your appointment will give your recipients an idea of what your appointment is about.

error._primary: Are you sure you want to send the task without a summary?
error._secondary: Adding a meaningful summary to your task will give your recipients an idea of what your task is about.

error._primary: Error loading calendar
error._secondary: The calendar is not marked for offline usage.

error._primary: Error loading task list
error._secondary: The task list is not marked for offline usage.

error._primary: Error loading memo list
error._secondary: The memo list is not marked for offline usage

error.title: Server Version
error._primary: Some features may not work properly with your current server.
error._secondary: You are connecting to an unsupported GroupWise server and may encounter problems using Evolution. For best results, the server should be upgraded to a supported version.
